Arcade Game

The Source Codes

About the project

This is the project 3 of the Udacity/Google-FEND program. The purpose of this project is to practice utilizing the visual assets and a game loop engine tools (provided to clone here) to add a number of entities to the game including the player characters and enemies to recreate the classic arcade game Frogger.

Walk-through instructions are provided to help succeeding the project.

Click to Play the Game

Author

Udacity - initial work - frontend-nanodegree-arcade-game

Wen Yu - completing the game - frontend-nanodegree-arcade-game

Game Functionality

In this game you have a Player and Enemies (bugs). The goal of the player is to reach the water, without colliding into any one of the enemies.

  1. The player can move left, right, up and down
  2. The enemies move at varying speeds on the paved block portion of the game board
  3. Once a the player collides with an enemy, the game is reset and the player moves back to the starting square
  4. Once the player reaches the water (i.e., the top of the game board), the game is won.
